TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit NamedPermissionSet extends System.Security.PermissionSet
Public NotInheritable Class NamedPermissionSet Inherits PermissionSet
public ref class NamedPermissionSet sealed : System::Security::PermissionSet

summary.span: 定义具有名称以及相关说明的权限集。

span.span: Defines a permission set that has a name and description associated with it.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名的权限集用在安全策略管理来指定要向代码属于特定代码组授予的权限。Named permission sets are used in security policy administration to specify the permissions to be granted to code that belongs to certain code groups. 名称是字母数字字符的字符串。Names are strings of alphanumeric characters. 描述字符串可以包含任何可打印字符。Description strings can consist of any printable characters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的成员的类。The following code example shows the use of members of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: permSet
param.span: 从中创建新实例的命名的权限集。

span.span: The named permission set from which to create the new instance.

summary.span: 从另一个命名的权限集初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from another named permission set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name for the new named permission set.

summary.span: 用指定的名称初始化 类的新的空实例。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建命名的权限集没有权限但权限状态。Using this constructor creates a named permission set with no permissions but with an permission state. 命名的权限集不受限制状态中有效地包含实现的所有权限接口。A named permission set in an unrestricted state effectively contains all permissions that implement the interface. 命名的权限集将包含所有内置权限以及自定义用户定义的所有权限实现。The named permission set will contain all built-in permissions as well as all custom user-defined permissions that implement . 所有权限都将都有的等效项`Unrestricted`权限状态。All permissions will have the equivalent of an `Unrestricted` permission state. 未实现的权限将是空实例。Permissions that do not implement will be empty instances.

exception.span: 参数为 或者是空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The parameter is or is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, state As PermissionState)

span.span: The name for the new named permission set.
One of the values.

summary.span: 在无限制状态或完全受限状态，用指定名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name in either an unrestricted or a fully restricted state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名的权限集不受限制状态中有效地包含实现的所有权限接口。A named permission set in an unrestricted state effectively contains all permissions that implement the interface. 命名的权限集将包含所有内置权限以及自定义的所有权限。The named permission set will contain all built-in permissions as well as all custom permissions. 将具有所有权限`Unrestricted` 。All permissions will have an `Unrestricted`. 未实现的权限，例如标识权限将是空实例。Permissions that do not implement , such as identity permissions, will be empty instances.

exception.span: 参数为 或者是空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The parameter is or is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 通过 XML 编码用指定的状态重新构造命名的权限集。

span.span: Reconstructs a named permission set with a specified state from an XML encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重新创建命名权限集从先前创建的 XML 元素的状态。This method recreates the state of a named permission set from an XML element previously created by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来重新创建对象。The following code example shows the use of the method to recreate a object. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.

Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 获取 对象的哈希代码，此代码适合在哈希算法和数据结构（例如哈希表）中使用。

span.span: Gets a hash code for the object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

returns.span: 当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的权限的两个实例的哈希代码可能不同，因此不应使用的哈希代码来比较两个对象。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might differ, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects.
